Keeping the Learning Alive (Remote Learning Page)

strong.strong: FAIRHAVEN PUBLIC SCHOOLS WILL BE CLOSED UNTIL MAY 4, 2020

strong.br: Welcome to the Fairhaven Public School District!

div.p: I am honored to serve as the Superintendent of Schools. Our people are our greatest asset! The district is able to secure the talents of bold administrators who are making extraordinary differences in the buildings and programs that they lead. A combination of dedicated and effective veteran faculty and staff along with the best and brightest in new faculty and staff choose to teach in Fairhaven. Collectively, the product of their efforts is that more families and students are choosing to attend the Fairhaven Public School District than ever before. There is a clear correlation between academic programming, a positive culture, and the decisions families make when deciding on their children’s education.

We work every day to get even better on behalf of our children. We recently re-set our district’s core values using the pillars of ambition, integrity, and perseverance as our foundation. It is my belief that our best is yet to come! It is my hope that your experience with our website and our district serves your needs.
